Standing in a zone created by a Residual Arcane creates a globe that orbits the player every 2s. The globes will strike the nearest enemy within 15m dealing 25 damage increasing their vulnerability to the globe's damage type by 25% for 1s. Globes will persist for 5s upon leaving the zone.

Standing in a zone created by a Residual Arcane creates a globe that orbits the player every 2s. The globes will strike the nearest enemy within 15m dealing 50 damage increasing their vulnerability to the globe's damage type by 50% for 2s. Globes will persist for 10s upon leaving the zone.
